mediumQuestions.question: Who created the World Space week?
Space Week is every year on October 4-10 to honor what two events?
options: the week when Bruce Willis saved us from a huge asteroid
the moon landing and the discovery of Pluto
the launch of Sputnik and Signing of Outer Space Treaty
the first days that aliens sought contact with earth

mediumQuestions.question: World Space Week was created to celebrate _______.
options: writers for giving us fantasy books
space science & tech for the improvement of human condition
new tech for films that are about outer space

mediumQuestions.question: How many countries celebrate Space Week?
World Space Week consists of space education and outreach events held by...
options: prestigious academic institutions that study outer space

mediumQuestions.question: What was the theme of the World Space Week in 2018
What was the theme for World Space Week in 2019?
options: Armageddon: What to do in case an asteroid hits the earth
The Moon: Gateway to the Stars
